title: Update contact WhatsApp and Call number to 9113112297

requirements.text: Update the Contact section WhatsApp and Call actions to use the phone number 9113112297.

quotes: The call and messages should go on this number '9113112297'

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/landing/landingContent.ts, contactInfo.whatsapp and contactInfo.phone are updated so the WhatsApp and tel: links target 9113112297.
Clicking the "WhatsApp Us" button opens a WhatsApp chat link that targets 9113112297.
Clicking the "Call Now" button triggers a tel: link that targets 9113112297.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any path listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not add any backend requirements; the contact actions remain frontend-only.
nonGoals: Changing any other landing page content, layout, styling, pricing, or copy.
Adding backend contact submission or storing contact form submissions.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
